title: Not really morning people
creator_credit: Renee Rutgrink and Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television
brief_description: Can’t handle Mondays? Don’t think you can get out of bed tomorrow? Perhaps you’re not really a morning person. A cheeky tour into our morning journeys guided by a couple of observant experts we never really notice.
creator_credit_for_label: Renee Rutgrink and Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television
